fields.name: Andrew Marconi
fields.description: Andrew Marconi is a Columbus, Ohio-based maker, digital designer and developer that finds inspiration in illustrations and global motifs from antiquity through the 1700s. He is the founder of 559 Labs a digital consultancy that focuses on enabling independent artists, small businesses and non-prfoit organizations.

fields.name: Laine Bachman
fields.agreement: Agreed on 6 Dec 2016, 50% of profit for her work.
fields.notes:
Short Bio: Throughout the years, Laine Bachman has had work included in several juried exhibitions and group shows at The Sherie Gallerie, Ohio Art League, The Riffe Gallery, The Concourse Gallery, The Carnegie Gallery, and Art Palm Beach. Her work has garnered a number of awards and can be found in many private and public collections. Often inspired by myths and folklore, Bachman infuses the world she creates with archetypal imagery, whimsical themes and decorative motifs.

** NOT LISTED ON SITE, PER HER REQUEST **
